thread.title: Watch James White give Patriots fans something to cheer with a touchdown
thread.title_full: Watch James White give Patriots fans something to cheer with a touchdown

author: Hayden Bird
title: Watch James White give Patriots fans something to cheer with a touchdown
text:
Watch James White give Patriots fans something to cheer with a touchdown Watch James White give Patriots fans something to cheer with a touchdown By Hayden Bird February 5, 2017 
Get Patriots game stats and the inside scoop on the season with The Boston Globe's Point After newsletter delivered for free to your inbox. 
Trailing 28-3, Tom Brady orchestrated a drive that finally gave the Patriots a touchdown in Super Bowl LI. 
Brady found James White for a five-yard touchdown on the 13th play of the 75-yard drive: James White makes a defender missâ€¦ and he's IN!
